title: Changed My Mind (feat. Loote)
lyrics:
One drink too much, we're drunk
We talk about the things we shouldn't say
One step too close, alone
Emotions take control, I shouldn't stay
I thought that this would be easy
My body didn't believe me

Deeper the ocean beneath me

I feel you holding on 'cause



I know that we're not supposed to

Do what we're so close to

Closer every night

Na-ah, I changed my mind

But I changed my mind

But I changed my mind



Across the room, I pull in close

Too close, almost all over you

It's magnetic, the way we feel

Are still like when, like when we moved



I know that we're not supposed to

Do what we're so close to

Closer every night

Na-ah, I changed my mind

But I changed my mind

But I changed my mind



How did I let it go so far, go so far, go so far?

How did I let it go so far, go so far?



I know that we're not supposed to

Do what we're so close to

Closer every night

Na-ah, I changed my mind

But I changed my mind

But I changed my mind



But I changed my mind
